trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a configuration system error has occurred.
The ConfigurationException exception is thrown if the application attempts to read or write data to the configuration file but is unsuccessful.
Some possible reasons for this can include malformed XML in the configuration file, file permission issues, and configuration properties with values that are not valid.
> [!NOTE] > The ConfigurationException object is maintained for backward compatibility.
The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> object replaces it for the configuration system.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> class.
A message describing why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception was thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> class.
The object that holds the information to deserialize.
Contextual information about the source or destination.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> class.
A message describing why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The inner exception that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> to be thrown, if any.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> class.
A message describing why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> to be thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> class.
A message describing why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The inner exception that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> to be thrown, if any.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> to be thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> class.
A message describing why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The path to the configuration file that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> to be thrown.
The line number within the configuration file at which this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> was thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> class.
A message describing why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception was thrown.
The inner exception that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> to be thrown, if any.
The path to the configuration file that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> to be thrown.
The line number within the configuration file at which this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> was thrown.
Gets a description of why this configuration exception was thrown.
The BareMessage property does not contain the name of the configuration file, nor the line number at which this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException> exception occurred.

If you want a message that contains the name of the configuration file and the line number, along with the message returned by the BareMessage property, use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException.Message%2A> property.
A description of why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception was thrown.
Gets the path to the configuration file that caused this configuration exception to be thrown.
The path to the configuration file that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the file name and line number at which this configuration exception occurred.

The GetObjectData method sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> object with the file name and line number at which this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException> exception occurred.

During deserialization, the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException> exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> object that is transmitted over the stream.
The object that holds the information to be serialized.
The contextual information about the source or destination.
Gets the path to the configuration file from which the internal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object was loaded when this configuration exception was thrown.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representing the node file name.
Gets the line number within the configuration file that the internal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object represented when this configuration exception was thrown.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref> representing the node line number.
Gets the line number within the configuration file at which this configuration exception was thrown.
The line number within the configuration file at which this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception was thrown.
Gets an extended description of why this configuration exception was thrown.

The Message property contains a concatenation of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException.BareMessage%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException.Filename%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException.Line%2A> properties.
An extended description of why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> exception was thrown.
